tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE health_records (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(255),
	age INT,
	diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
	treatment_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_description VARCHAR(255),
  physician_name VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  treatment VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  medication VARCHAR(255),
  dosage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
 patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
 record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
 heart_rate INT,
 blood_pressure INT,
 temperature FLOAT,
 record_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
 treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
 treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
 treatment_description TEXT,
 treatment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE medical_professionals (
 professional_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 professional_name VARCHAR(50),
 specialization VARCHAR(50),
 experience_years INT,
 hospital_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    dosage VARCHAR(50),
    frequency VARCHAR(50),
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    appointment_date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
    reason TEXT
);
